parent1.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour using a noise factor that depends on a custom combination of edge count and distance to guide the search towards a better solution.

parent2.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix by applying a gradient descent approach using the derivative of the objective function with respect to each edge distance to iteratively adjust the edge distances towards a minimized total tour distance.
parent2.code:

parent3.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the inverse of the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour with a noise factor that depends on a custom combination of edge count and distance to guide the search towards a better solution.

parent4.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the inverse of the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour with a noise factor that depends on a custom combination of edge count and distance to guide the search towards a better solution.

parent5.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the sum of the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour and the reciprocal of the edge count to guide the search towards a better solution.

offspring.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix by considering the product of edge count and distance, and incorporating a noise factor that varies based on the reciprocal of the edge count and a custom function of the edge distance.
